text:
[Verse]
Gazing up at night
Stars burn so bright
In the cool moonlight
Everything feels right

[Verse 2]
Dreams in the air
Shining everywhere
Feel it in my soul
Let the good times roll

[Chorus]
Stars in the sky
Let your spirits fly
Dance till morning light
Everything's alright

[Verse 3]
Heartbeat quickens now
Lost in time somehow
Hands reach to the stars
Dream big go far

[Verse 4]
Whispers in the breeze
Gentle melodies
Lost in endless skies
See the world through new eyes

[Chorus]
Stars in the sky
Let your spirits fly
Dance till morning light
Everything's alright
title: Stars in the Sky
